Description: Normal 0 false false false RU X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Rare Military USSR Chronograph Poljot aircraft 1-MChZ Kirov. I bring to your attention Rare USSR Chronograph aircraft 1-MChZ .In an excellent status. In 1959 Kirov’s Factory got special order to develop reliable wrist watch-chronograph. So “POLJOT” cal. 3017 with big column-wheel movement and 45-minute counter was born. It was developed under the big secret. Strela-Poljot intended only for command structure of Soviet Air Forces and Troop of Cosmonauts and was issued under military inspection. It never was on open sale. When the pilot retired special commission solved leave or not the watch for retiring pilot. In 1965 pilots-cosmonauts Pavel Belyayev and Alexey Leonov with the chronograph POLJOT 1-MChZ for the first time in histories of astronautics left in open cosmos. With the same watches have awarded first pilot-cosmonaut Jury Gagarin. So Strela-Poljot was the first chronograph visited cosmos and the first watch visited in open space. . Watches are in a fine condition. Perfectly work and well keep time. Chronograph function works perfectly. This watch is a stylish acquisition for collectors, good present or for everyday use!
